Action.Name: GlobalPaths.GetPaths
Action.Description: Gets all GlobalPath variable names(made by GlobalPaths) and returns them as strings in an indexed table.

Action.Name: GlobalPaths.GetPathValues
Action.Description: Returns the values of all GlobalPath variables.

Action.Name: GlobalPaths.RegisterPaths
Action.Description: Creates variables for all of the folders in your _ExeFolder directory (Excluding the Data Folder [default is AutoPlay]) as _MyFolder for folders and _MyFolder_MySubFolder for sub folders.

Arg.Name: Simple Mode
Arg.Description: Creates separate variables for each folder and sub folder in your main _ExeFolder dorectory as oppossed to stacking the variables together.

Action.Note: This action is entirely for the benefit of the programmer and is not needed for the plugin to function. Keep in mind that the table items, though returned as strings, are global variables and not actual strings.

Action.ReturnValueDescription: Returns the values of all GlobalPath variables in an indexed table.

Action.Note: Simple Mode will create a single variable for each folder and sub folder. e.g. _MyFolder and _MySubFolder, notice how they are separated in Simple Mode.
